3.2. Devices¶

3.2.1. Interfaces¶

This module defines interfaces for Beamline Control Module.

3.2.2. Automounter¶

class bcm.device.automounter.Automounter(pv_name, pv_name2=None)
Automounter.dismount(port=None)
Automounter.mount(port, wash=False)
Automounter.probe()
Automounter.wait(timeout=60.0)
class bcm.device.automounter.AutomounterClient(device)
AutomounterClient.dismount(port=None)
AutomounterClient.mount(port, wash=False)
AutomounterClient.probe()
AutomounterClient.remote_message(msg)
AutomounterClient.remote_mounted(state)
AutomounterClient.remote_progress(state)
AutomounterClient.remote_state(state)
AutomounterClient.remote_update(state)
AutomounterClient.setup()
AutomounterClient.wait(state='idle')
class bcm.device.automounter.AutomounterContainer(location, status_str=None)
AutomounterContainer.configure(status_str=None)
class bcm.device.automounter.AutomounterServer(device)
AutomounterServer.on_message(obj, msg)
AutomounterServer.on_mounted(obj, state)
AutomounterServer.on_progress(obj, state)
AutomounterServer.on_state(obj, state)
AutomounterServer.on_update(obj, state)
AutomounterServer.remote_dismount(*args, **kwargs)
AutomounterServer.remote_mount(*args, **kwargs)
AutomounterServer.remote_probe()
AutomounterServer.remote_wait(**kwargs)
AutomounterServer.setup(device)
class bcm.device.automounter.BasicAutomounter
BasicAutomounter.parse_states(state)
class bcm.device.automounter.SimAutomounter(name='Sim Automounter')
SimAutomounter.dismount(port=None)
SimAutomounter.mount(port, wash=False)
SimAutomounter.probe()
SimAutomounter.wait(timeout=60.0)

3.2.3. Counters¶

class bcm.device.counter.Counter(pv_name, zero=0)
Counter.count(t)
class bcm.device.counter.SimCounter(name, zero=0)
SimCounter.count(t)

3.2.4. Detector¶

class bcm.device.detector.MXCCDImager(name, size, resolution)
MXCCDImager.get_state()
MXCCDImager.initialize(wait=True)
MXCCDImager.save(wait=False)
MXCCDImager.set_parameters(data)
MXCCDImager.start(first=False)
MXCCDImager.stop()
MXCCDImager.take_background()
MXCCDImager.wait(state='idle')
class bcm.device.detector.SimCCDImager(name, size, resolution)
SimCCDImager.get_state()
SimCCDImager.initialize(wait=True)
SimCCDImager.save(wait=False)
SimCCDImager.set_parameters(data)
SimCCDImager.start(first=False)
SimCCDImager.stop()
SimCCDImager.wait(state='idle')

3.2.5. Diagnostics¶

Created on Jun 1, 2010

@author: michel

class bcm.device.diagnostics.CryojetDiag(descr, cryojet, lo, hi)
CryojetDiag.on_lev_change(obj, val)
CryojetDiag.on_noz_change(obj, val)
CryojetDiag.on_temp_change(obj, val)
class bcm.device.diagnostics.DeviceConnectedDiag(descr, device, on, off)
class bcm.device.diagnostics.DiagnosticBase(descr)

Base class for diagnostics.

DiagnosticBase.get_status()
class bcm.device.diagnostics.OpenShutterDiag1(descr, device)
class bcm.device.diagnostics.OpenShuttersDiag(descr, *args)
class bcm.device.diagnostics.PVInRange1(descr, pv, lo, hi)
PVInRange1.on_change(obj, val)

3.2.6. Diffractometer¶

class bcm.device.diffractometer.Diffractometer(distance, two_theta, name='Diffractometer')
Diffractometer.get_state()
Diffractometer.stop()
Diffractometer.wait()
exception bcm.device.diffractometer.DiffractometerError

Base class for errors in the diffractometer module.

3.2.7. Goniometer¶

class bcm.device.goniometer.Goniometer(name)
Goniometer.configure(**kwargs)
Goniometer.get_state()
Goniometer.scan(wait=True)
Goniometer.set_mode(mode, wait=False)
class bcm.device.goniometer.MD2Goniometer(name, omega_motor)
MD2Goniometer.configure(**kwargs)
MD2Goniometer.get_state()
MD2Goniometer.on_log_status(pv, txt)
MD2Goniometer.on_mode_changed(pv, val)
MD2Goniometer.scan(wait=True)
MD2Goniometer.set_mode(mode, wait=False)
MD2Goniometer.stop()
class bcm.device.goniometer.SimGoniometer
SimGoniometer.configure(**kwargs)
SimGoniometer.get_state()
SimGoniometer.scan(wait=True)
SimGoniometer.set_mode(mode, wait=False)
SimGoniometer.stop()

3.2.8. Multi-Channel Analyzer¶

class bcm.device.mca.MultiChannelAnalyzer(name, nozzle=None, channels=4096)
MultiChannelAnalyzer.acquire(t=1.0)
MultiChannelAnalyzer.channel_to_energy(x)
MultiChannelAnalyzer.configure(**kwargs)
MultiChannelAnalyzer.count(t)
MultiChannelAnalyzer.energy_to_channel(y)
MultiChannelAnalyzer.get_state()
MultiChannelAnalyzer.stop()
MultiChannelAnalyzer.wait()
class bcm.device.mca.SimMultiChannelAnalyzer(name, channels=4096)
SimMultiChannelAnalyzer.acquire(t=1.0)
SimMultiChannelAnalyzer.channel_to_energy(x)
SimMultiChannelAnalyzer.configure(**kwargs)
SimMultiChannelAnalyzer.count(t)
SimMultiChannelAnalyzer.energy_to_channel(y)
SimMultiChannelAnalyzer.get_state()
SimMultiChannelAnalyzer.stop()
SimMultiChannelAnalyzer.wait()

class bcm.device.monochromator.Monochromator(simple_energy, energy, mostab)
Monochromator.get_state()
Monochromator.stop()
Monochromator.wait()
exception bcm.device.monochromator.MonochromatorError

Base class for errors.

3.2.10. Motors¶

class bcm.device.motor.BraggEnergyMotor(name, enc=None)
BraggEnergyMotor.get_position()
BraggEnergyMotor.move_to(pos, wait=False, force=False)
class bcm.device.motor.CLSMotor(name)
class bcm.device.motor.ENCMotor(name)
class bcm.device.motor.EnergyMotor(pv1, pv2, enc=None)
EnergyMotor.get_position()
class bcm.device.motor.FixedLine2Motor(x, y, slope, intercept, linked=False)
FixedLine2Motor.configure(**kwargs)
FixedLine2Motor.get_position()
FixedLine2Motor.get_state()
FixedLine2Motor.is_enabled()
FixedLine2Motor.is_healthy()
FixedLine2Motor.is_moving()
FixedLine2Motor.move_by(val, wait=False, force=False)
FixedLine2Motor.move_to(pos, wait=False, force=False)
FixedLine2Motor.stop()
FixedLine2Motor.wait(start=True, stop=True)
class bcm.device.motor.Motor(pv_name, motor_type)
Motor.configure(**kwargs)
Motor.get_position()
Motor.get_state()
Motor.is_enabled()
Motor.is_healthy()
Motor.is_moving()
Motor.move_by(val, wait=False, force=False)
Motor.move_to(pos, wait=False, force=False)
Motor.stop()
Motor.wait(start=True, stop=True)
class bcm.device.motor.MotorBase(name)

Base class for motors.

class bcm.device.motor.MotorClient(device)
MotorClient.get_position()
MotorClient.get_state()
MotorClient.move_by(pos, wait=False, force=False)
MotorClient.move_to(pos, wait=False, force=False)
MotorClient.setup()
MotorClient.stop()
MotorClient.wait(start=True, stop=True)
exception bcm.device.motor.MotorError

Base class for errors in the motor module.

class bcm.device.motor.MotorServer(device)
MotorServer.getStateForClient()
MotorServer.remote_get_position()
MotorServer.remote_get_state()
MotorServer.remote_move_by(*args, **kwargs)
MotorServer.remote_move_to(*args, **kwargs)
MotorServer.remote_stop()
MotorServer.remote_wait(**kwargs)
MotorServer.setup(device)
MotorServer.setup_client(client)
class bcm.device.motor.MotorShutter(motor)

Used for CMCF1 cryojet Motor

MotorShutter.close()
MotorShutter.get_state()
MotorShutter.open()
class bcm.device.motor.PseudoMotor(name)
class bcm.device.motor.PseudoMotor2(name)
class bcm.device.motor.RelVerticalMotor(y1, y2, omega)
RelVerticalMotor.configure(**kwargs)
RelVerticalMotor.get_position()
RelVerticalMotor.get_state()
RelVerticalMotor.is_enabled()
RelVerticalMotor.is_healthy()
RelVerticalMotor.is_moving()
RelVerticalMotor.move_by(val, wait=False, force=False)
RelVerticalMotor.move_to(val, wait=False, force=False)
RelVerticalMotor.stop()
RelVerticalMotor.wait(start=True, stop=True)
class bcm.device.motor.SimMotor(name, pos=0, units='mm')
SimMotor.get_position()
SimMotor.get_state()
SimMotor.is_enabled()
SimMotor.is_healthy()
SimMotor.is_moving()
SimMotor.move_by(pos, wait=False)

3.2.11. Video¶

class bcm.device.video.AxisCamera(hostname, id=None, name='Axis Camera')
AxisCamera.get_frame()

AxisPTZCamera.center(x, y)
AxisPTZCamera.get_presets()
AxisPTZCamera.goto(position)
AxisPTZCamera.zoom(value)
class bcm.device.video.CACamera(pv_name, zoom_motor, name='Camera')
CACamera.get_frame()
CACamera.zoom(val)
class bcm.device.video.FDICamera(hostname, name='FDI Camera')
FDICamera.get_frame()
FDICamera.stop()
class bcm.device.video.SimCamera(name='Camera Simulator')
SimCamera.get_frame()
class bcm.device.video.SimZoomableCamera(name, motor)
SimZoomableCamera.zoom(value)
exception bcm.device.video.VideoError

Base class for errors in the video module.

class bcm.device.video.VideoSrc(name='Basic Camera', maxfps=10.0)
VideoSrc.add_sink(sink)
VideoSrc.del_sink(sink)
VideoSrc.get_frame()
VideoSrc.start()
VideoSrc.stop()
class bcm.device.video.ZoomableAxisCamera(hostname, zoom_motor, id=None, name='Zoomable Axis Camera')
ZoomableAxisCamera.zoom(value)
